titles.title: To amend the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act to ensure coverage for individuals with preexisting conditions, and for other purposes.
Maintaining Protections for Patients with Preexisting Conditions Act of 2019
Maintaining Protections for Patients with Preexisting Conditions Act of 2019
Maintaining Protections for Patients with Preexisting Conditions Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, and Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
